```jsjavascript

const title = document.getElementById("title");

console.log(title.innerText); // Displays the text of the element with ID "title"

```

```jsjavascript

const items = document.getElementsByClassName("item");

console.log(items.length); // Displays the number of elements with class "item"

```

```jsjavascript const paragraphs = document.getElementsByTagName("p"); console.log(paragraphs.length); // Displays the number of elements

```
